site_name: Servicing yard to rear of the Duke of York Headquarters, London, SW3
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 8 (Trees and landscaping) of planning permission 23/08508 (External alterations associated with the creation of a new area of public realm including alterations to levels, repaving and rationalisation of hard landscaping, creation of seating zones and screen to separate back of house from public realm, installation of plant equipment and plant screens, installation and replacement of louvres, lowering of external standalone curved wall, installation of screens and glazing, installation and replacement of doors and windows, opening up of bricked-up openings, relocation of private access gate, removal of planting and provision of replacement planting, relocation of cycle parking, provision of a bin store, replacement of timber cladding, installation of wire trellis system, replacement of lighting fixtures, and other associated works).
